docs.text: Welcome to Auguri Docs This is the documentation for Auguri . Install git clone git@github.com:Auguri/auguri.git pip install ./auguri Basic Usages import auguri symbols = auguri.equity.get_symbols() exchanges = auguri.equity.get_exchanges() ticker = auguri.Ticker('AAPL') history = ticker.history() Code References Crypto Equity Ticker
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This is the documentation for Auguri .
docs.title: Welcome to Auguri Docs

docs.text: git clone git@github.com:Auguri/auguri.git pip install ./auguri
docs.title: Install

docs.text: import auguri symbols = auguri.equity.get_symbols() exchanges = auguri.equity.get_exchanges() ticker = auguri.Ticker('AAPL') history = ticker.history()
docs.title: Basic Usages

docs.text: Crypto Equity Ticker
docs.title: Code References

docs.text: Module crypto
docs.title: Crypto

docs.text: Module equity filter_stocks ( filter , size = None ) Apply the given filter to screen stocks. Parameters: Name Type Description Default filter str Filter name. required size int If set, limit the maximum size of the result. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: [description] get_exchanges () Get all available exchanges. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Exchanges and related information. get_filters () Get a list of filters that can be applied to filter stocks. Returns: Type Description List[str] List[str]: A list of usable filters. get_symbols () Get all available symbols. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Symbols and related information. get_ticker ( symbol ) Get the ticker of the given symbol. Parameters: Name Type Description Default symbol str Symbol of the stock. required Returns: Type Description Ticker Ticker: Ticker of the stock.
docs.title: Equity

docs.text: Apply the given filter to screen stocks. Parameters: Name Type Description Default filter str Filter name. required size int If set, limit the maximum size of the result. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: [description]
docs.title: filter_stocks()

docs.text: Get all available exchanges. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Exchanges and related information.
docs.title: get_exchanges()

docs.text: Get a list of filters that can be applied to filter stocks. Returns: Type Description List[str] List[str]: A list of usable filters.
docs.title: get_filters()

docs.text: Get all available symbols. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Symbols and related information.
docs.title: get_symbols()

docs.text: Get the ticker of the given symbol. Parameters: Name Type Description Default symbol str Symbol of the stock. required Returns: Type Description Ticker Ticker: Ticker of the stock.
docs.title: get_ticker()

docs.text: Class Ticker The abstruct data container of a symbol. balance_sheet ( self , frequency ) Retrieve balance sheet data for most recent four quarters or four years. Parameters: Name Type Description Default frequency str Display either quarterly ('q') or annual ('a') data. required Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Balance sheet. calendar_events ( self ) Earnings and Revenue expectations for upcoming earnings date of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Calendar events. cash_flow ( self , frequency ) Retrieve cash flow data for most recent four quarters or four years. Parameters: Name Type Description Default frequency str Display either quarterly ('q') or annual ('a') data. required Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Cash flow data. company_officers ( self ) Retrieves top executives of the symbol and their total pay. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Officers information. corporate_events ( self ) Significant corporate events related to the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Significant corporate events. earnings ( self ) Recent earnings data of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Earnings data. earnings_diff ( self ) Recent earnings data of the symbol with comparison between actual and estimate. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Earnings data comparison table. earnings_trend ( self ) Historical earnings trend data and revenue estimations of the symbol. Returns: Type Description List[Dict] List[Dict]: Earnings trend data. financial_data ( self ) Financial KPIs of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Financial KPIs. fund_holding_info ( self ) Contains information for a funds top holdings, bond ratings, bond holdings, equity holdings, sector weightings, and category breakdown. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Fund holding data. fund_performance ( self ) Historical return data of the fund and its specific category. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Fund performance data. fund_profile ( self ) Summary level information of a fund. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Profile data. fund_sector_weightings ( self ) Retrieves aggregated sector weightings of the fund. Returns: Type Description DataFrame Dict: Sector weightings data. fund_top_holdings ( self ) Retrieves top 10 holdings of the fund. Returns: Type Description DataFrame Dict: Top 10 holdings. grading_history ( self ) Data related to upgrades / downgrades by firms. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Grading history data. history ( self , period = 'max' , interval = '1d' , start = None , end = None , ** kwargs ) Query the historical technical data of the symbol with period and sample interval. Parameters: Name Type Description Default period str One of '1d' | '5d' | '7d' | '60d' | '1mo' | '3mo' | '6mo' | '1y' | '2y' | '5y' | '10y' | 'ytd' | 'max'. Defaults to 'max'. 'max' interval str One of '1m' | '2m' | '5m' | '15m' | '30m' | '60m' | '90m' | '1h' | '1d' | '5d' | '1wk' | '1mo' | '3mo'. Defaults to '1d'. '1d' start str or datetime.datetime Start date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None end str or datetime.datetime End date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: The historical technical data of the symbol. income_statement ( self , frequency ) Retrieve income statement data for most recent four quarters or four years. Parameters: Name Type Description Default frequency str Display either quarterly ('q') or annual ('a') data. required Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Income statement data. index_trend ( self ) Trend data related the symbol's index, specificially PE and PEG ratios. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Index trend data. insider_holders ( self ) Data related to stock holdings of the symbol's insiders. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Insider holders data. insider_transactions ( self ) Transactions by the insiders of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Insider transactions data. institution_ownership ( self ) Top 10 institution owners of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Owners data. key_stats ( self ) KPIs of the symbol (PE, enterprise value, EPS, EBITA, etc.). Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: KPIs. major_holders ( self ) Data showing percentage of insiders, institutions, etc. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Major holders data. news ( self ) Get news headline and summary information of the symbol. Returns: Type Description List[Dict] List[Dict]: News. option_chain ( self ) View option chain data for all expiration dates of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Option chain data. organization_ownership ( self ) Top 10 fund owners of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Owners data. peers ( self ) Query peer symbols with correlation scores. Returns: Type Description List[Dict] List[Dict]: With format like [{'symbol': symbol, 'score': score}]. price ( self ) Detailed pricing related data of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Detailed pricing related data. quote ( self ) Get real-time quote information of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Quote information. quote_type ( self ) Stock exchange specific data of the quote of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Quote type information. recommendation_trend ( self ) Data related to historical recommendations (buy, hold, sell) of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Historical recommendations data. sec_filings ( self ) Historical SEC filings of the symbol. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Historical SEC filings. share_purchase_activity ( self ) High-level buy / sell data of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: High-level buy / sell data. summary ( self ) Contains the summary information of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Summary information. technical_insights ( self ) Technical indicators of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Technical indicators. trend_views ( self ) Short, Mid, and Long-term trend data of the symbol. Returns: Type Description Dict Dict: Trend data. valuation_measures ( self ) Retrieve valuation measures for most recent four quarters as well as the most recent date. Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: Valuation measures data.

String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None end str or datetime.datetime End date of history. String parsed as '%Y-%m-%d'. Defaults to None. None Returns: Type Description DataFrame DataFrame: The historical technical data of the symbol.
